keyword: calories in chick fil a spicy deluxe
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe
meta_description: Discover calories in Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for customization.
assumptions: Standard menu item: spicy breaded chicken filet, lettuce, tomato, American cheese, pickles on a toasted bun; no modifications or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on Chick-fil-A standard data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe sandwich contains 540 calories and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe?
What's the protein in Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe?
How much sodium is in Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe?
faqs.a: About 1670 mg of sodium per sandwich.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe?
faqs.a: 44 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Can I make Chick-fil-A Spicy Deluxe lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, remove cheese (-50 kcal) or use grilled chicken (-100 kcal) for fewer calories.
